description: Tools for monitoring the behavior of the Bifrost application

panels.description: The shows the number of messages processed by each actor normalized by the total number of messages. This metric is useful for determining which actors are receiving the most messages with the system.
panels.title: Relative mailbox size across actors

panels.description: The number of messages that were processed in the latest time interval.
panels.title: Processed Messages

panels.description: The distribution of processing time for the NodeViewHolder over the entire time of interest.
panels.title: Occurrence of time spent processing messages for NodeViewHolder (ms)

panels.description: The average and standard deviation of processed messages over the specified time period
panels.title: Average number of processed messages

panels.description: The distribution of queue time by actors over the entire time of interest. This is useful to show which actors may be taking a long time to get to processing messages.
panels.title: Occurrence of time spent queued in a mailbox (us)

panels.description: The distribution of processing time by actors over the entire time of interest. This is useful to show which actors may be taking a long time to process messages.
panels.title: Occurrence of time spent processing messages (us)

panels.content:
### Number of processed messages by actor
---
Shows the total number of processed messages for each actor in each interval

#### Metric details
* Name: akka.group.processing-time
* Type: timer
* Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.

panels.title: Number of processed messages by actor

panels.content:
### Total time spent processing messages
---
Shows the total time spent processing messages for each time interval.

**NOTE:** The Y-axis is log-scaled

#### Metric details
* Name: akka.group.processing-time 
* Type: timer
* Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.

### Average time to process a message
---
Shows the mean time to process messages for each actor. This is computed by summing the total time spent processing messages and dividing by the total number of messages processed.

**NOTE:** Y-axis is log scaled

#### Metric details 
* Name: akka.group.processing-time
* Type: timer
* Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.

panels.title: Average time to process a message

panels.content:
### Average time messages are queud in mailboxes by actor
---
Shows the mean time to dequeue a message for processing for each actor. This is computed by summing the total time spent by dequeued messages in the mailbox and dividing by the total number of dequeued messages.

#### Metric details
* Name: akka.actor.time-in-mailbox
* Type: timer
* Description: Tracks the time since the instant a message is enqueued in an Actor's mailbox until it is dequeued for processing.

panels.title: Average time a message is in a mailbox

panels.description:
executor.threads.min gauge
Tracks executor minimum number of Threads.

executor.threads.max gauge
Tracks executor maximum number of Threads.
panels.title: Executor threads minimum

panels.description:
executor.threads.min gauge

executor.threads.max gauge
Tracks executor maximum number of Threads.
panels.title: Executor threads minimum

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = class
list.label: Actor path

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = class
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = class WHERE instance = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = instance
